alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Delaware and northwestern Randolph Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Matthews to 7 miles northeast of Anderson. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Muncie around 405 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 69 between mile markers 234 and 251. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
